constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

decision_conditions: The proposed extensions and alterations are considered to fall within the parameters of  permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Classes B & C of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

Demolition, piling, and excavation works all have the potential to adversely impact Thames Water assets. Please bear in mind that Thames Water will hold the developer and any relevant contractor/sub-contractor liable for any losses incurred or damage caused to Thames Water assets arising from construction works or subsequent use of the facility.

The submitted existing and proposed floor plans, elevations do not have scale bar. Please revise the existing and proposed floor plans and elevation with scale bar.Note: The Existing and Proposed Floor Plans and Elevations need to be at a recognised scale (at 1:50 or 1:100 for example), showing the outline of the entire floor plan, not just part and all key dimensions for the proposed works.
